physical_appearance: This is an unsigned form. It is printed in black ink on a sheet of paper. The sheet of paper has faint marks of words in the background. The declaration consists of two lines. At the bottom-right, there are empty fields for signature, date and personal particulars. There is a fold line across the vertical center of the document.
sgcool_label_text: Loose papers from the James Steele, P.O.W archive that include a symbolic drawing, Japanese banana money, map of camp, administrative papers from Changi prison pre-dating internment, list of soldiers of a regiment as well as James Steeleâ€™s warrant to  join the army. These papers are part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
title_text: Miscellaneous scraps of paper from P.O.W James Steele Archives (30 pieces) P.O.W. James Steele Archives: Empty form declaring compliance
